content:
Solid dividers will create a clean and sleek look, and adding Marvel-themed decorations will really make your display pop!

Hanging Marvel posters and the Spider-Man logo sign above the shelf is a great idea. It'll create a focal point and tie the whole display together. You can also consider adding some other decorative elements, such as:

* A Marvel-themed backdrop or wallpaper for the shelf
* Spider-Man figurine stands or dioramas to add depth and visual interest
* Marvel-themed shelf liners or risers to add a pop of color and theme

Congratulations on scoring the new Spider-Man: No Way Home figures at the comic-con event! 12 Spider-Man figures is an impressive collection, and I'm sure they'll look amazing in their dedicated section.

You might want to consider displaying your Spider-Man figures in a way that tells a story or showcases their different costumes and characters. For example, you could:

* Display them in chronological order, showcasing the different costumes and characters from the comics and movies
* Group them by theme, such as villains, allies, or specific storylines
* Create a "battle scene" with your Spider-Man figures facing off against their enemies

Remember, the fun part of collecting is displaying your figures in a way that's meaningful and visually appealing to you!

What's your favorite Spider-Man figure in your collection, and how do you plan to display the new No Way Home figures?
